channel.title: Kenya on Fundi Willy's Low-Level Electronics Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Kenya on Fundi Willy's Low-Level Electronics Lab

item.title: Nyeri Baptist School
item.description: The sound of drifing wind and background noise of students discussing in low tones is the relative ambience that I observed for the short duration that I was in Nyeri Baptist School. I cannot forget to mention the fact that apart from the normal mobile network, the air seemed electrically clean. No numerous untamed, unmanaged wifi signals roaming in the air that we soak in daily in Nairobi. It was just the best condusive environment for knowledge.
